sect2.title: Installation of Libtool
sect2.para: This package requires its patch to be applied before you can install it. Issue the following command to apply the patch:
And finish off installing the package:

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: patch -Np1 -i ../libtool-&libtool-patch-version;.patch: This patch fixes an incompatibility between Autoconf 2.53 and Libtool 1.4.x. Specifically, the deprecated m4 macro AC_PROVIDE_AC_LIBTOOL is replaced by AC_PROVIDE_ELSEIF.
